story.text: Hello and welcome to your first adventure! Today we will go through the story of Little Red Riding Hood.
It all began when I was hungry, and stumbled across a cottage with 3 bowls of porridge inside! What would you do here?
Well...I broke in and ate it! But the first bowl was too hot, the second bowl was too cold, and luckily the last bowl was just right.
After such a good meal I had to sit down, and I found 3 chairs! The first was too big, the second was too small, but the third was just right.
Then I got sleepy so I found a bedroom! The first bed was too hard, the second was too soft, and the third was just right. Good night!
All of a sudden I heard a grumble and woke up to find 3 bears standing over my bed! I ran away before they could eat me.

Sam loved to walk. He liked hearing the birds sing and feeling the wind on his face.
One sunny day, he walked so far that he found a big, green forest. The trees were so tall they tickled the clouds.
Suddenly, two little creatures appeared!
Chipper the squirrel waved his fluffy tail.
“Hi there! Follow me! I’ll teach you how to climb a tree!” he squeaked.
Aaron the groundhog popped out of a hole and said,
“Don’t climb trees! Come see my home underground. It’s warm and cozy!”

Sam followed Chipper and started to climb the big oak tree.
“Hold on tight!” Chipper called. “Use your feet, not just your hands!”
When Sam reached the top, the forest spread out like a green ocean.
He could see his house far away!
“Look there!” said Chipper. “A bird’s nest! Do you want to peek inside?”
